revised_title: The Electrical Effects of Light on Green Leaves and the Study of Contact Sensitiveness to Electric Radiation
tldr: The author investigates the electrical effects of light on green leaves and the contact sensitiveness of various substances to electric radiation. They discover that some substances, like potassium, show an increase in resistance during electric wave impacts, while others exhibit a decrease in resistance. This study helps differentiate between positive and negative actions of radiation and highlights the importance of understanding the nature of sensitive substances.
